A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The good :
-some awesome FX
-a few cool scenes
-Kylo and Rey are much better than in VII

The ugly :
-clear ripoffs from ESB and ROTJ (déjà vu all the way)
-weak main plot and terrible subplots (which make the movie feel MUCH 
 too long)
-poorly exploited side characters with zero backgrounds
-the guardian of the galaxy humour-like doesn't work\, at worst it even 
 alters the perception you have from the characters and make it look like a 
 spacballs ripoff.
